objects.specification: A large spacious exhibit floor panel with a smooth polished concrete finish in light gray, providing a solid and even surface for the entire booth. The surface is durable and slightly reflective with subtle texture to mimic real indoor exhibition flooring.

A tall front wall panel made of lightweight modular exhibition walls with a smooth matte white finish, featuring minimalistic seams and reinforced metal framing for stability. Designed to provide a clean backdrop for banners and graphics.

A tall back wall panel made of lightweight modular exhibition walls with a smooth matte white finish, featuring minimalistic seams and reinforced metal framing for stability. Designed to provide a clean backdrop for banners and graphics.

A tall side wall panel made of lightweight modular exhibition walls with a smooth matte white finish, featuring minimalistic seams and reinforced metal framing for stability. Designed to provide a clean backdrop for banners and graphics.

A tall side wall panel made of lightweight modular exhibition walls with a smooth matte white finish, featuring minimalistic seams and reinforced metal framing for stability. Designed to provide a clean backdrop for banners and graphics.

A sleek modern demo car with aerodynamic curves, glossy bright red paint, tinted windows, chrome wheel rims, and detailed headlights. The car has realistic proportions and smooth reflective surfaces to catch visitors' attention.

A modern reception desk with a curved front panel, constructed from light oak veneer and white laminate top. It features a recessed counter shelf for visitor interactions and integrated LED strip lighting along the underside of the tabletop.

A sleek exhibition display stand with a tall slender steel frame in matte black, topped with a clear glass shelf, designed to showcase brochures or small accessories. The shelf has beveled edges and hidden fasteners.

children.specification: A detailed miniature automotive component part, such as a polished metal piston with realistic grooves and metallic sheen, intended as decorative element.

objects.specification: A large fabric banner with high-resolution car-themed graphics printed on matte vinyl, featuring bold branding and vibrant imagery. The banner has reinforced grommets and tensioned mounting on the wall.

objects.specification: A ceiling-mounted spotlight fixture with industrial metal housing and a focused warm white LED beam. The lamp has an adjustable tilt mechanism and vents for heat dissipation.
